Document.string: This is a joystick with which you can control your character by moving it in space and turning it.
This is the health of the character if it is finished you lose.

All that moves and pursues your character is your enemies, you can destroy them with different types of weapons, the main weapon is triggered when the player pointed at the enemy. After destroying the enemy, the player gets points and an item can fall out of the enemy.

After the destruction of the enemy drop the item. The most common item is an experience crystal, which will fill up the experience bar when the player fills it, after which the player gets a new level. Also, there are other items, but their action you have to find out for yourself.

When you get a new level a window opens in which you can choose an ability. There are 2 types of abilities are passive, those with pumping will increase the player's parameters and active, which will give the player a new type of weapon or defense.

When you get a new level a window opens in which you can choose an ability. Abilities come in 2 types are passive, those with pumping will increase the player's parameters and active, which will give the player new types of weapons or protection.
After you lose you can add your records to the table. Good luck, try to last as long as possible and score more points than the other players!
Red crystal give much more experiance
Bosses can drop chest with few skills
If you run out of health, the game is over
